resource.name: CardX CIED Connectivity Server Capability Statement
resource.description: This capability statement describes the requirements for systems that make CIED Connectivity data available.

resource.description: Additional modifiers to connectivity status as calculated by the CIED manufacturer

resource.name: CIED Connectivity Status Values
resource.description: Codes system for CIED connectivity and monitor device types

resource.name: CIED Device Extension
resource.description: Extension to represent cardiac implantable device(s) which generated the observation.

resource.name: CIED Patient Identifier
resource.description: Identifiers which can be used to identify CIED patients.

resource.name: Device - Cardiovascular Implantable Electronic Device (CIED)
resource.description:
The following data-elements must always be present (Mandatory definition) or must be supported if the data is present in the sending system (Must Support definition). They are presented below in a simple human-readable explanation. Profile specific guidance and examples are provided as well. The Formal Profile Definition below provides the formal summary, definitions, and terminology requirements.

Within IEEE 11073-10103, MDC_IDC_DEV contains the following data elements:
MDC_IDC_DEV_TYPE
MDC_IDC_DEV_MODEL
MDC_IDC_DEV_SERIAL
MDC_IDC_DEV_MFG

resource.name: Device - CIED Monitor Profile
resource.description:
The following data-elements must always be present (Mandatory definition) or must be supported if the data is present in the sending system (Must Support definition). They are presented below in a simple human-readable explanation. Profile specific guidance and examples are provided as well. The Formal Profile Definition below provides the formal summary, definitions, and terminology requirements.

Within IEEE 11073-10103, MDC_IDC_DEV contains the following data elements:
MDC_IDC_DEV_TYPE
MDC_IDC_DEV_MODEL
MDC_IDC_DEV_SERIAL
MDC_IDC_DEV_MFG

resource.name: IEEE 11073-10103 Device Type
resource.description: The type of device as defined by IEEE 11073-10103

resource.name: IEEE 11073-10103 Session Type
resource.description: The type of session as defined by IEEE 11073-10103

resource.name: ISO/IEEE-11073-10103
resource.description: ISO/IEEE-11073-10103 - Implantable Device Cardiac nomenclature.

resource.name: Observation - CIED Connectivity
resource.description:
Profile of the observation resource to present the most recent connectivity status and associated information for a CIED/Monitor pair.

CIEDs and monitors connect at regular intervals to exchange data ranging from every few minutes to every other week depending on the device/monitor configuration and manufacturer. The connectivity observation profile is a snapshot in time and is not intended to be used to query historical log information that may have been captured by the remote monitoring IoT platform. A single observation will be returned for every CIED/monitor pair.

resource.name: Patient - CIED Patient Profile
resource.description: An CIED profile of the Patient resource.
